comments.body: we might want to avoid ssh hosts by default as that setup is not guaranteed for the tests.

The inventory group "skip-during-build" lists ssh and paramiko_ssh, so those won't run automatically when running `make test_connection`, but you can override that with TEST_FLAGS.

If we can get a local ssh server running in the docker containers during build in the future we could allow those to run in that scenario.
